Title: Establishes the crime of disruption of an online public meeting
Summary: Establishes the crime of disruption of an online public meeting when a person with intent to cause public inconvenience, annoyance or alarm, without lawful authority, and acting through a computer service, he or she disturbs any lawful assembly or meeting of persons open to the public conducted through a computer service; makes such crime a class B misdemeanor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of disruption of an online public meeting
